ComputePlatform.description: The destination platform type for the deployment (Lambda, Server, or ECS).

DeploymentConfigName.description: A name for the deployment configuration. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the deployment configuration name. For more information, see Name Type.
DeploymentConfigName.markdownDescription:
A name for the deployment configuration. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the deployment configuration name. For more information, see Name Type.
